spec.description: Request authentication configuration for workloads. See more details at: https://istio.io/docs/reference/config/security/request_authentication.html

jwtRules.description: Define the list of JWTs that can be validated at the selected workloads' proxy.

audiences.description: The list of JWT [audiences](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.3) that are allowed to access.

forwardOriginalToken.description: If set to true, the original token will be kept for the upstream request.

fromCookies.description: List of cookie names from which JWT is expected.

fromHeaders.description: List of header locations from which JWT is expected.

prefix.description: The prefix that should be stripped before decoding the token.

fromParams.description: List of query parameters from which JWT is expected.

issuer.description: Identifies the issuer that issued the JWT.

jwks.description: JSON Web Key Set of public keys to validate signature of the JWT.

jwks_uri.description: URL of the provider's public key set to validate signature of the JWT.

jwksUri.description: URL of the provider's public key set to validate signature of the JWT.

outputClaimToHeaders.description: This field specifies a list of operations to copy the claim to HTTP headers on a successfully verified token.

claim.description: The name of the claim to be copied from.

header.description: The name of the header to be created.

outputPayloadToHeader.description: This field specifies the header name to output a successfully verified JWT payload to the backend.

matchLabels.description: One or more labels that indicate a specific set of pods/VMs on which a policy should be applied.

group.description: group is the group of the target resource.

kind.description: kind is kind of the target resource.

name.description: name is the name of the target resource.

namespace.description: namespace is the namespace of the referent.
